n. an artifact that is one of the individual parts of which a composite entity is made up; especially a part that can be separated from or attached to a system
wordList.translation:
n. 元件, 组件, 成分
a. 组成的, 构成的
[计] 组件
wordList.tag: gk cet4 cet6 ky toefl ielts gre

wordList.definition:
v. decide upon or fix definitely
v. determine the essential quality of
v. be specific about
wordList.translation:
vt. 详列, 指定, 说明
[计] 指定

wordList.definition:
n. a reply of denial
n. a piece of photographic film showing an image with light and shade or colors reversed
a. characterized by or displaying negation or denial or opposition or resistance; having no positive features
a. expressing or consisting of a negation or refusal or denial
wordList.translation:
n. 否定, 否定语, 负数, 底片
a. 否定的, 消极的, 负的, 阴性的
n. 负数, 负值
[计] 负数, 负值

wordList.definition:
v. travel to or penetrate into
v. examine minutely
v. examine (organs) for diagnostic purposes
wordList.translation: v. 探险, 探测, 探究
wordList.tag: gk cet4 cet6 ky toefl ielts

wordList.definition:
n. a future prospect or potential
n. capability of existing or happening or being true
n. a possible alternative
wordList.translation:
n. 可能性, 可能的事
[法] 可能性, 可能发生的事, 不确定权

wordList.definition: v. exchange messages
wordList.translation:
vi. 符合, 通信, 相当
[法] 符合, 一致, 相当
